articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Viatris sells API & women's healthcare business in India for $1.2 billion - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Viatris has also sold its OTC (over- the- counter) business in Europe and commercialisation rights in a few non-core markets as part of a global divestiture drive to pare debt.
articles.content: Viatris (formerly Mylan Inc) has finalised twin deals in India to divest its API (active pharmaceutical ingredients) and women's healthcare businesses for a combined consideration of around $1.2 bill… [+2008 chars]

articles.title: Webb's wide-angle view of the Orion Nebula is released in ESASky - European Space Agency
articles.description: New images of the Orion Nebula from the NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope have been included in ESA’s ESASky application, which has a user-friendly interface to visualise and download astronomical data.
articles.content:

articles.title: Climate Change May Modify the Risk of Falling Prey to Infectious Diseases - India Education Diary
